overview: Noé is lost. Like a sleepwalker, he follows the echo of a mysterious woman's footsteps along the dimly lit streets of a decadent city, which resemble the delirious labyrinths of his own consciousness. In this desolate landscape, gruesome figures, old chimeras, and ominous mirages will push Noé to embark himself on a one-way journey to his own perdition.
title: Eco
